articles.description: Both Bumrah and Hardik will only know their fate on Monday morning when the Ajit Agarkar-led selection committee will reveal India's Asia Cup squad | Cricket
articles.content: India all-rounder Hardik Pandya's leadership ability has been a stunning revelation in his white-ball career. Ever since impressing experts and then the India selectors after guiding Gujarat Titans t… [+2474 chars]
